heading: Overview
text: technical manual documents methods used develop FMG-toolbox.

heading: 5.1 Platforms
text: FMG toolbox uses ESRI open source software construct custom toolbox analysis reporting forestry inventory data.ArcGIS Desktop -Desktop (ArcMap ArcGIS Pro) industry standard enterprise desktop GIS products conducting geospatial analysis. ArcGIS desktop applications contain enormous number commercial--shelf (COTS) geospatial tools performing sophisticated analyses visualization.ArcGIS toolbox - ArcGIS Desktop allows creation sophisticated custom geospatial toolboxes built combine ESRI’s COTS geoprocessing tools user created tools several platforms (e.g., Python, R).Python - ArcGIS provides robust scripting interface GIS tools using Python language. Custom geospatial toolboxes can combine ESRI’s COTS geoprocessing tools tools available within diverse, mature, ever-growing Python data science ecosystem.R - ESRI’s ArcGIS R-bridge product allows R tools called within ArcGIS toolbox interface. allows ArcGIS tools take advantage mature ecosystem R data science, statistical, visualization, report generation packages

heading: 5.2 ArcGIS Toolbox
text: FMG toolbox contains two toolsets, QA toolset Summary toolset. ArcGIs toolbox developed using custom Python scripts.
